title: 23 Slow Cooker Chicken Thigh Recipes
description: Find 23 chicken thigh recipes for the slow cooker, including honey-garlic chicken thighs, easy chicken thigh recipes, and more.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 23 Slow Cooker Chicken Thigh Recipes By Melanie Fincher Melanie Fincher Melanie Fincher is a Birmingham, Alabama–based food writer who covers everything from cooking techniques to gadget reviews. She has nearly 7 years experience writing news and lifestyle content. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on April 19, 2021 Close Credits: fabeveryday Juicy, tender, and full of flavor, chicken thighs are one of our favorite cuts of chicken — and the slow cooker makes them so easy to cook. Unlike chicken breasts, which can dry out in the slow cooker, dark meat chicken thighs stay fork-tender even after hours of cooking. These hands-off, slow cooker chicken thigh recipes are as easy as dumping all the ingredients in your appliance and forgetting about it until dinner time — although we do recommend searing the chicken thighs ahead of time for the crispiest, most delicious skin. Whether you're looking for boneless or bone-in, here are 23 chicken thigh recipes for the slow cooker. 01 of 24 Slow Cooker Latin Chicken View Recipe Save Cynthia LaFourcade Spicy cumin, salsa, black beans, and sweet potatoes add beautiful flavor and color to juicy chicken thighs in this hearty stew. "I will definitely be adding this recipe to my regular line-up: simple delicious rich hearty!" raves reviewer Jessie Furman. 02 of 24 Slow Cooker Butter Chicken View Recipe Save ICGOLDFISH Similar to Chicken Tikka Masala, Butter Chicken is cooked in a buttery, tomato-based gravy. You can find many of the spices called for at a well-stocked supermarket or Indian or Asian markets. 03 of 24 Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs View Recipe Save Myrna The combination of sweet honey and pungent garlic is a fan-favorite, but don't take it from me: Over 1,400 home cooks have given this six-ingredient recipe a 5-star rating. 10 Honey-Garlic Recipes That Prove This Is the Ultimate Flavor Combo 04 of 24 Frank's Favorite Slow-Cooker Thai Chicken View Recipe Save kkupcake037 Salsa, peanut butter, coconut milk, lime juice, soy sauce, and ginger mingle in this fresh take on slow cooker chicken thighs. Recipe creator sweet-potato notes, "You'll never guess this is made with chicken thighs! They really taste better than using breast meat which dries out in the crock pot - and thighs are more economical." 05 of 24 White Chicken Enchilada Slow-Cooker Casserole View Recipe Save Deb C Forget rolling up tortillas for enchiladas, this throw-together dinner sandwiches a creamy chicken mixture between layers of torn up tortillas. 06 of 24 Slow Cooker Adobo Chicken with Bok Choy View Recipe Save Chicken Adobo is a Filipino dish in which chicken is slowly braised in a garlic-soy sauce mixture until tender. But thanks to your slow cooker, you no longer have to stand over the stove to make it. Serve over bok choy. 07 of 24 Chicken Tagine View Recipe Save In this take on a traditional Moroccan dish, chicken thighs, eggplant, onion, carrots, dried cranberries, and apricots are simmered in an aromatic sauce and served with couscous. 08 of 24 Jenny's Cuban-Style Slow-Cooker Chicken Fricassee View Recipe Save Nenasinpena Fricase de Pollo, or Cuban-style Chicken Fricassee, consists of dark meat chicken, potatoes, and tons of other veggies simmered in a white wine- and tomato-based sauce. 09 of 24 Slow Cooker Moscow Chicken View Recipe Save rae A saucy mixture of chicken thighs, bacon, and Russian-style dressing comes together in the slow cooker for an easy 6-ingredient meal. Recipe creator Val-Flowers suggests serving over steamed rice or egg noodles. 10 of 24 Easy and Delicious Slow Cooker Cassoulet View Recipe Save Linda T Ease yourself into the world of French cooking with this slow cooker take on a classic French dish. "Double the recipe for leftovers - it melds overnight very well," suggests recipe creator smart cookie. 15 Easy and Impressive French Recipes You Can Make at Home 11 of 24 Slow Cooker Belgian Chicken Booyah View Recipe Save "This is a booyah recipe that is adapted from originally a 50 gallon recipe cooked in large 55 gallon cast-iron kettles with a wood fire, most often at church picnics in northeastern Wisconsin," says recipe creator Bill Bartelme. This is a hearty stew loaded with chicken thighs, potatoes, beef stew meat, and tons of veggies. 12 of 24 Slow Cooker Chicken and Mushroom Stew View Recipe Save Liz Dalton 'Lizzie' Here's a rich and creamy stew with a kick — thanks to chorizo sausage, Cajun seasoning, and cayenne pepper. The Best Recipes with Chorizo Sausage 13 of 24 Becky's Gluten-Free Slow Cooker Chicken Vegetable Soup View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole This "throw-together recipe," as recipe creator Becky! describes it, features boneless chicken thighs, long-grain rice, gluten-free chicken stock, and tons of vegetables. 14 of 24 Slow Cooker Sweet and Sour Chicken Thighs View Recipe Save fabeveryday Even better than takeout, this sweet and sour chicken is served with juicy pineapple chunks, red bell peppers, and green onions for a fresh take on a favorite dish. Our 20 Best Stir-Fry Recipes That Are Even Better Than Take-Out 15 of 24 Skinny Slow Cooker Gumbo View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Here's a lighter take on classic gumbo that doesn't require making a time consuming roux. Allrecipes Allstar Soup Loving Nicole suggests adding okra to serve as a thickener. 16 of 24 Slow Cooker Mediterranean Chicken and Vegetables View Recipe Save Kim's Cooking Now Aromatic spices like turmeric, ginger, coriander, and cumin are used to season this nutritious, protein- and vegetable-packed slow cooker dinner. Serve with couscous and pita bread. 17 of 24 Chicken and Cheddar Biscuits View Recipe Save Linda T This is a slow cooker take on downhome comfort food — it's similar to chicken and dumplings, but the "dumplings" (in this case, Cheddar biscuits), are served on the side. 20 Takes on Chicken and Dumplings for Comfort in a Bowl 18 of 24 Slow Cooker Chicken Massaman Curry View Recipe Save Photo by JenniferCooks. Recipe creator JenniferCooks describes this chicken Massaman curry as "...creamy, slightly spicy, nutty, and rich with flavor." Serve over rice. 19 of 24 Slow Cooker Filipino Chicken Adobo View Recipe Save Chef Mo This six-ingredient iteration of Chicken Adobo is as simple as they come: Simply add chicken thighs, peppercorns, garlic, bay leaves, soy sauce, and vinegar to a slow cooker and cook on high for five hours. 20 of 24 Red Chicken Chili View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen You won't miss the beef in this hearty chicken chili. "It's important to use the roasted tomatoes, otherwise you won't get the same robust flavor," notes recipe creator marybcurlyq. 21 of 24 Slow Cooker Green Chile Chicken View Recipe Save Bites of Flavor Chicken, onion, and fresh cilantro are tossed in a homemade green chile sauce made with fresh tomatillos. "Serve over brown rice and garnish with chopped cilantro, pico de gallo, avocado, and cheese, or wrap in a tortilla!" suggests recipe creator Bites of Flavor. 22 of 24 Slow Cooker Chicken and Lentil Soup View Recipe Save Rebekah Rose Hills This is a nutritious soup that doubles as straight comfort food. Lentils, tomatoes, onions, and bone-in chicken thighs, along with tons of spices, make up this broth-based soup. Our 15 Best Lentil Recipes 23 of 24 Slow Cooker Teriyaki Pulled Chicken View Recipe Save A Day In the Kitchen For a fresher-tasting alternative to pulled pork, try this pulled Teriyaki chicken flavored with tamari, honey, garlic, and ginger. Serve on a crusty bun. 24 of 24 Related: Pictured: Air Fryer Chicken Thighs. Allrecipes 28 Bone-In Chicken Thigh Recipes 25 Oven-Baked Chicken Thigh Recipes Ready In Under 1 hour Browse our entire collection of Chicken Thigh Recipes. Explore more: Everyday Cooking Slow Cooker Main Dishes Chicken Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
